titlestmt.titleproper: William Temple Franklin North American Land Company stock certificate, 1795
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: William Temple Franklin North American Land Company stock certificate
did.abstract: North American Land Company stock certificate no. 978 representing shares 14098 to 14102.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: William Temple Franklin (1760-1823), grandson of Benjamin Franklin, was born in England and became an American diplomat and real estate speculator.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: North American Land Company stock certificate no. 978 representing shares 14098 to 14102, 1795 February 20, issued in Philadelphia to Benjamin Temple Franklin. Issuing of five shares of North American Land Company stock to William Temple Franklin. "Dividend whereof shall not be less than six dollars on each share." Signed "in the presence and by order of the Board of Manager, at Philadelphia," on April 18, 1795, by James Marshall, secretary, and Robert Morris, signer of the Declaration of Independence, then president of the North American Land Company.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: William Temple Franklin stock certificate, 1795, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
